effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.
Set: Elemental Blast damage increased by 25%. Earthquake damage increased by 25%.
(4) Set: Spending Maelstrom grants you 5% increased critical strike chance and 10% increased critical damage dealt for 5 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 363 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
